website_summaries.verdict: The long steel cable and pin on this lock goes through the barrel of your long-gun to make it unable to be fired.
pros: When lock is on, the firing mechanism is completely disabled
Long length on the cable allows you to secure the gun as well as the firing mechanism
Good for temporarily securing of your firearm
Works well for AR-15 and other long guns
cons: This lock may make it harder to fit your firearm in a carrying bag

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Needs a couple things.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of good build quality other than the locking rod was very rusty. Two things I'd suggest. 1. Cable is very thin. Needs to be more substantial. 2. When lock is inserted it would be nice if the piece un the chamber were orange like a chamber flag. I fixed this giving it the krylon touch as seen in pic 2.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 1

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: When I'm at the range I have to leave my AR's on the bench as I walk down range to service my targets. Don't want to worry about my AR's "walking off" or "going off" while my back is turned. The cable on the lockdown AR MAG Well Lock is long enough that I can wrap it around the bench top then lock it into the Well Lock. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: CplPlink58

customer_reviews.title: Polymer, yes. Worth it, yes!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the design. Yes it is polymer, but so are Pmags and a lot of other gear. The best security is when no one knows about something. This just adds another layer and allows you to secure and conceal an AR. The magwel lock is also great by itself if you have children and want to keep it secured that way. As with any lock, safe, or security measure it can be broken or cut with enough time and energy, but as I mentioned this is a great added measure in my opinion especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure your AR 15.
customer_reviews.text: Good snug fit. Locks in tight. Good to keep firearm unusable to kids or others not allowed. If someone had time, they could try to break it apart a nd get it out. With a 1/4 turn of the key, you can leave it locked to the cable and remove the unit from the at. Good if you take it in your vehicle and want to secure it so someone can't grab it and run. I will be buying another one or two.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good for what I spent on this lock. I can leave my rifle in the truck an stop at the store and not worry about a smash and grab robbery. There are much better safes like the one from Hornady if you have over $300 dollars and the space. Where I live my vehicle has never been broken into. But I like the piece of mind. I would have payed more for a heavier cable or a chain. But this will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: jim fairman

customer_reviews.title: AR Mag Well Lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a temporary safety solution for me as I do not yet have a gun safe. My ammo and mags are locked up and this is extra insurance. With this in place there is no way to load or operate the rifle. It can be used with or without the cable. The cable will not stop a determined thief but it will keep a kid from playing with it if found. The only minor negative is that the dust cover can't be closed with this installed. Not a big deal for me as I keep my rifle in a carry bag. I keep the keys in my pistol safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S

customer_reviews.title: Good lock!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good lock, I had gotten it because I have my siblings around so I have to make sure they can’t get into my gun when I’m not around. Also it’s somewhat good as a theft deterrent for when I travel with my firearm in my car, I don’t know how well it would hold up if someone tried pulling at it hard though. It’s pretty easy to use as well, a lot more accessible compared to the lock they give you when you first buy the gun.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lock. Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews from other Amazon customers and it mentioned how it was difficult to turn the key. I noticed mine did the same but it was because it wasn't in all the way. You have to pull back the charhing handle. This is a perfect lock to have when transporting or when at the range. I wouldn't leave it in there full time because it would mess up the springs in the charging handle since it pins it back. It would be great if they came in Red or Orange to make it easier to notice that it's in there.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat product. I was looking for something to temporarily secure an AR inside a vehicle and this works perfectly. With the lock installed the upper and lower cannot be separated which is necessary for an AR lock. The cable and locking pin also look to be pretty sturdy. Attach the cable through the seat frame and the lock is plenty to temporary security.
customer_reviews.author: Ray98

customer_reviews.title: Eliminate grab and run thefts.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it. Time will tell if dirt has much affect. The broken key issue some have is not an issue if you'll keep pressure pushing in and don't jerk it just turn it. Mine works fine that way. It fits mil spec great, it's pretty snug in my New Frontier but works. I'll be getting a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The cable could be thicker
customer_reviews.text: As others have said the cable is a bit thin and could be thicker. Good purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Little Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great security measure!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this magwell lock. I don’t have a safe so I take extra security steps to ensure my Rifle cannot be accessed by anyone but me, specially since it is for sport and not home defense (I have handgun for that).
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Gives a feeling of security!
customer_reviews.text: Allows me to lock my AR to my car. Secure inoperable.
customer_reviews.author: James Prulhiere

customer_reviews.title: Best $25 I spent lately
customer_reviews.text: This product is not fast but it keeps your firearm from being stolen or used
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: Did not work, arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism on the thing was broken when it arrived so it would not keep the anchor in place or stay in the magazine well, it was basically an overprice chamber flag. Company apparently does not QA test before sending out
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works great but you got to really jam it in or ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but you got to really jam it in or the lock wont turn. Lock is a bit chinsy but all gun locks are this way. I lile that it locks the mag and bcg.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Stillman

customer_reviews.title: Poor lock.
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but the key almost twists off when trying to unlock. At this point I will return it
customer_reviews.author: Jacko

customer_reviews.title: Good intermediate protection for ar platform guns
customer_reviews.text: Used on lock my stag arms ar mostly to keep it safe from in my house and on the road. Very effective and easy to use. I suspect you could drill out the lock but if someone is the determined to break it I reckon I should have used a gun safe.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly into mag well and secures upper and lower together. One issue is that turning the key is difficult at times.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It will not stop a determined or well prepared thief, but it will prevent a quick snatch and grab.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit. Locking piece appears to be upside down
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the mag lock would work great. However, the unit I received has the physical locking unit, which stops the mag lock from being removed, is upside down. This causes you to be unable to actually engage the lock. Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Brandt Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Love this little gizmo for my aR15
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gizmo for my aR15. If they develop the same thing for a Glock 9 model 14 I will be purchasing at first chance.
customer_reviews.author: tim_l

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and Value. Easy to leave in the car to secure my AR.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Fits AR15 good
customer_reviews.text: Fits my M&P 15 perfectly. Live the tether cable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy use, perfect for transportation of your AR15, and/or secure storage needs.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my AR-15 perfect. I like having the extra security and piece of mind, along with the quick easy unlock mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: MrBlueSky

customer_reviews.title: Great product I hate cable locks and distain trigger locked ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product I hate cable locks and distain trigger locked even more. The key movement could be better but for the price it works great
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a hassle free lock for your AR then these are the way to go! Super easy to use and works perfectly every time!
customer_reviews.author: Mesh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for transporting ur AR in states that have struck gun laws
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product looks great when AR is locked
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. This product looks great when AR is locked. This item is just what i needed to transport my AR from en to the range.
customer_reviews.author: arturo

customer_reviews.title: Will not work on all ARs
customer_reviews.text: It won't lock into the mag well of a Frontier Armory composite lower.
customer_reviews.author: james n.

customer_reviews.title: Good: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good: Easy to use. Locks with or without cable to secure gun and lock it to something stationary. It locks the BCG to the rear so the upper and lower receiver cannot be separated. Bad: Outer shell is plastic locking mechanism is metal. Not sure how much abuse it could take if someone really wanted to destroy it. Cable probably couldn't take a bolt cutter. The BCG locked back forces the dust cover to remain open all the time. I don't think it could be opened in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little too well, very tight but definitely works
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great! I like it better then the typical cable ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and tried it out. Seems to work great! I like it better then the typical cable lock.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rubinoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy, secure and much, much better than all the alternatives!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Meiselman

customer_reviews.title: Great for going to and from your range or hunting spot.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good security product for your rifle that accepts USGI or "standard" NATO 5.56 magazines. It inserts into the mag well, and when locked both blocks the bolt face, chamber, and magazine well from being operated in any way. The device extends small panels when locked that firmly secure it in place, making it difficult to the point of impossibility to operate the rifle without disassembling it in some kind of destructive fashion. There is no substitute for a home gun safe, but this is an excellent option for your rifles in transit to better protect them from misuse.
customer_reviews.author: James Lehnerd

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and built solid. You have to pull the bolt back to insert the maglock. This makes it impossible to separate the lower. It looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Lee H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best I have ever used, be safe not sorry with kids around
customer_reviews.author: Laurina

customer_reviews.title: It just works. Allows me to keep it safe ...
customer_reviews.text: It just works. Allows me to keep it safe while maintaining the looks. No messy cables getting tangled in my gunbag either.
customer_reviews.author: Stabby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product arrive promptly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product arrive promptly.....you won't find a better locking mechanism for the AR style rifles. Secures the upper and lower to each other and cannot be taken apart while lock is engaged.
customer_reviews.author: carlos ramrez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I have one on each AR whether locked up or traveling
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Junk - Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Junk. The internals of this unit are so stiff it must have been sitting on the shelf for years. I loaded it up with WD-40 and let it sit for a couple hours. Not much improvement. I almost broke the key off in the lock each time I tried to lock this without it even being in the mag well!! I am not comfortable using this as I am afraid the key will break off while in the well and I will not be able to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Feels like the key will break
customer_reviews.text: Will not lock within mag well. Feels like the key will break ...
customer_reviews.author: Ian M. Lendrum

customer_reviews.title: Not constructed well
customer_reviews.text: Broke as soon as I pulled on it with a little force. It would be a great product if it was made of a light weight metal.
customer_reviews.author: justin moran

product_meta.title: Lockdown MAG Well Lock
product_meta.description: The Lockdown tactical rifle Mag Well Lock conveniently locks into the magazine well of certain tactical magazine platform guns to secure the gun in an unfireable condition. It engages into the bolt raceway while holding the bolt carrier partially open, completely disabling the firing mechanism. This also prevents the upper from being disassembled from the lower. A high strength coated steel cable and pin are included that allow the lock and gun to be anchored to any stationary object such as a frame member in a vehicle. Glass reinforced Nylon construction is durable and robust, yet is non-marring or damaging for inserting in your magazine well. Two keys included. Works with any Mil-Spec type rifles and fully disables the firing mechanism Prevents disassembly of the upper and lower Prevents a magazine from being loaded into the firearm Comes with theft deterrent steel anchoring cable.
feature_bullets: A high strength coated steel cable and pin are included
Locks into the magazine well of certain tactical rifle platform guns to secure the gun in an unfireable condition
